   20: 
   21: %%
   22: -module(ssl_alpn_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -behaviour(ct_suite).
   25: 
   26: -include("ssl_test_lib.hrl").
   27: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   28: 
   29: %% Callback functions
   30: -export([all/0,
   31:          groups/0,
   32:          init_per_suite/1,
   33:          end_per_suite/1,
   34:          init_per_group/2,
   35:          end_per_group/2,
   36:          init_per_testcase/2,
   37:          end_per_testcase/2]).
   38: 
   39: %% Testcases
   40: -export([empty_protocols_are_not_allowed/1,
   41:          protocols_must_be_a_binary_list/1,
   42:          empty_client/1,
   43:          empty_server/1,
   44:          empty_client_empty_server/1,
   45:          no_matching_protocol/1,
   46:          client_alpn_and_server_alpn/1,
   47:          client_alpn_and_server_no_support/1,
   48:          client_no_support_and_server_alpn/1,
   49:          client_renegotiate/1,
   50:          session_reused/1,
   51:          client_alpn_npn_and_server_alpn_npn/1,
   52:          client_alpn_and_server_alpn_npn/1,
   53:          client_alpn_npn_and_server_alpn/1
   54:         ]).
   55: 
   56: %% Apply export
   57: 
   58: -export([assert_alpn/2,
   59:          assert_alpn_and_renegotiate_and_send_data/3,
   60:          ssl_send_and_assert_alpn/3,
   61:          ssl_receive_and_assert_alpn/3,
   62:          ssl_send/2,
   63:          ssl_receive/2,
   64:          connection_info_result/1
   65:         ]).
   66: 
   67: -define(SLEEP, 500).
   68: 
   69: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   70: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   71: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   72: 
   73: all() ->
   74:     [
   75:      {group, 'tlsv1.3'},
   76:      {group, 'tlsv1.2'},
   77:      {group, 'tlsv1.1'},
   78:      {group, 'tlsv1'},
   79:      {group, 'dtlsv1.2'},
   80:      {group, 'dtlsv1'}
   81:     ].
   82: 
   83: groups() ->
   84:     [
   85:      {'tlsv1.3', [], [{group, alpn_tests}]},
   86:      {'tlsv1.2', [], [{group, alpn_tests}, {group, alpn_not_1_3}]},
   87:      {'tlsv1.1', [], [{group, alpn_tests}, {group, alpn_not_1_3}]},
   88:      {'tlsv1', [],   [{group, alpn_tests}, {group, alpn_not_1_3}]},
   89:      {'dtlsv1.2', [],[{group, alpn_tests}, {group, alpn_not_1_3}]},
   90:      {'dtlsv1', [],  [{group, alpn_tests}, {group, alpn_not_1_3}]},
   91:      {alpn_tests, [parallel], alpn_tests()},
   92:      {alpn_not_1_3, [parallel], alpn_not_1_3()}
   93:     ].
   94: 
   95: alpn_tests() ->
   96:     [empty_protocols_are_not_allowed,
   97:      protocols_must_be_a_binary_list,
   98:      empty_client,
   99:      empty_server,
  100:      empty_client_empty_server,
  101:      no_matching_protocol,
  102:      client_alpn_and_server_alpn,
  103:      client_alpn_and_server_no_support,
  104:      client_no_support_and_server_alpn
  105:     ].
  106: 
  107: alpn_not_1_3() ->
  108:     [
  109:      client_alpn_npn_and_server_alpn_npn,
  110:      client_alpn_and_server_alpn_npn,
  111:      client_alpn_npn_and_server_alpn,
  112:      client_renegotiate,
  113:      session_reused
  114:     ].
  115: 
  116: 
  117: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
  118:     catch application:stop(crypto),
  119:     try application:start(crypto) of
  120: 	ok ->
  121: 	    ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
  122: 	    ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config0)
  123:     catch _:_ ->
  124: 	    {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  125:     end.
  126: 
  127: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  128:     ssl:stop(),
  129:     application:unload(ssl),
  130:     application:stop(crypto).
  131: 
  132: 
  133: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  134:     ssl_test_lib:init_per_group(GroupName, Config). 
  135: 
  136: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  137:   ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  138: 
  139: 
  140: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  141:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  142:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 10}),
  143:     Config.
  144: 
  145: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->     
  146:     Config.
  147: 
  148: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  149: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  150: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  151: 
  152: empty_protocols_are_not_allowed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  153:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  154:     {error, {options, {alpn_preferred_protocols, {invalid_protocol, <<>>}}}}
  155: 	= (catch ssl:listen(9443,
  156: 			    [{alpn_preferred_protocols, [<<"foo/1">>, <<"">>]}| ServerOpts])),
  157:     {error, {options, {alpn_advertised_protocols, {invalid_protocol, <<>>}}}}
  158: 	= (catch ssl:connect({127,0,0,1}, 9443,
  159: 			     [{alpn_advertised_protocols, [<<"foo/1">>, <<"">>]} | ServerOpts])).
  160: 
  161: %--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  162: 
  163: protocols_must_be_a_binary_list(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  164:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  165:     Option1 = {alpn_preferred_protocols, hello},
  166:     {error, {options, Option1}} = (catch ssl:listen(9443, [Option1 | ServerOpts])),
  167:     Option2 = {alpn_preferred_protocols, [<<"foo/1">>, hello]},
  168:     {error, {options, {alpn_preferred_protocols, {invalid_protocol, hello}}}}
  169:         = (catch ssl:listen(9443, [Option2 | ServerOpts])),
  170:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
  171:     Option3 = {alpn_advertised_protocols, hello},
  172:     {error, {options, Option3}} = (catch ssl:connect({127,0,0,1}, 9443, [Option3 | ClientOpts])),
  173:     Option4 = {alpn_advertised_protocols, [<<"foo/1">>, hello]},
  174:     {error, {options, {alpn_advertised_protocols, {invalid_protocol, hello}}}}
  175:         = (catch ssl:connect({127,0,0,1}, 9443, [Option4 | ClientOpts])).
  176: 
  177: %--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  178: 
  179: empty_client(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  180:     run_failing_handshake(Config,
  181:                           [{alpn_advertised_protocols, []}],
  182:                           [{alpn_preferred_protocols, [<<"spdy/2">>, <<"spdy/3">>, <<"http/2">>]}],
  183:                           no_application_protocol).
  184: 
  185: %--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  186: 
  187: empty_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  188:     run_failing_handshake(Config,
  189:                           [{alpn_advertised_protocols, [<<"http/1.0">>, <<"http/1.1">>]}],
  190:                           [{alpn_preferred_protocols, []}],
  191:                           no_application_protocol).
  192: 
  193: %--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  194: 
  195: empty_client_empty_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  196:     run_failing_handshake(Config,
  197:                           [{alpn_advertised_protocols, []}],
  198:                           [{alpn_preferred_protocols, []}],
  199:                           no_application_protocol).
  200: 
  201: %--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  202: 
  203: no_matching_protocol(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  204:     run_failing_handshake(Config,
  205:                           [{alpn_advertised_protocols, [<<"http/1.0">>, <<"http/1.1">>]}],
  206:                           [{alpn_preferred_protocols, [<<"spdy/2">>, <<"spdy/3">>, <<"http/2">>]}],
  207:                           no_application_protocol).
  208: 
  209: %--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  210: 
  211: client_alpn_and_server_alpn(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  212:     run_handshake(Config,
  213:                   [{alpn_advertised_protocols, [<<"http/1.0">>, <<"http/1.1">>]}],
  214:                   [{alpn_preferred_protocols, [<<"spdy/2">>, <<"http/1.1">>, <<"http/1.0">>]}],
  215:                   {ok, <<"http/1.1">>}).
  216: 
  217: %--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  218: 
  219: client_alpn_and_server_no_support(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  220:     run_handshake(Config,
  221: 		    [{alpn_advertised_protocols, [<<"http/1.0">>, <<"http/1.1">>]}],
  222: 		    [],
  223: 		    {error, protocol_not_negotiated}).
  224: 
  225: %--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  226: 
  227: client_no_support_and_server_alpn(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  228:     run_handshake(Config,
  229: 		    [],
  230: 		    [{alpn_preferred_protocols, [<<"spdy/2">>, <<"http/1.1">>, <<"http/1.0">>]}],
  231: 		    {error, protocol_not_negotiated}).
  232: 
  233: %--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  234: 
  235: client_alpn_npn_and_server_alpn(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  236:     run_handshake(Config,
  237: 		    [{alpn_advertised_protocols, [<<"http/1.0">>, <<"http/1.1">>]},
  238: 		        {client_preferred_next_protocols, {client, [<<"spdy/2">>], <<"spdy/3">>}}],
  239: 		    [{alpn_preferred_protocols, [<<"spdy/2">>, <<"http/1.1">>, <<"http/1.0">>]}],
  240: 		    {ok, <<"http/1.1">>}).
  241: 
  242: %--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  243: 
  244: client_alpn_npn_and_server_alpn_npn(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  245:     run_handshake(Config,
  246: 		    [{alpn_advertised_protocols, [<<"http/1.0">>, <<"http/1.1">>]},
  247: 		        {client_preferred_next_protocols, {client, [<<"spdy/2">>], <<"spdy/3">>}}],
  248: 		    [{alpn_preferred_protocols, [<<"spdy/2">>, <<"http/1.1">>, <<"http/1.0">>]},
  249: 		        {next_protocols_advertised, [<<"spdy/2">>, <<"http/1.0">>]}],
  250: 		    {ok, <<"http/1.1">>}).
  251: 
  252: %--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  253: 
  254: client_alpn_and_server_alpn_npn(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  255:     run_handshake(Config,
  256: 		    [{alpn_advertised_protocols, [<<"http/1.0">>, <<"http/1.1">>]}],
  257: 		    [{alpn_preferred_protocols, [<<"spdy/2">>, <<"http/1.1">>, <<"http/1.0">>]},
  258: 		        {next_protocols_advertised, [<<"spdy/2">>, <<"http/1.0">>]}],
  259: 		    {ok, <<"http/1.1">>}).
  260: 
  261: %--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  262: 
  263: client_renegotiate(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  264:     Data = "hello world",
  265:     
  266:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
  267:     ClientOpts = [{alpn_advertised_protocols, [<<"http/1.0">>]}] ++ ClientOpts0,
  268:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  269:     ServerOpts = [{alpn_preferred_protocols, [<<"spdy/2">>, <<"http/1.1">>, <<"http/1.0">>]}] ++  ServerOpts0,
  270:     ExpectedProtocol = {ok, <<"http/1.0">>},
  271: 
  272:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  273:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  274:                     {from, self()},
  275:                     {mfa, {?MODULE, ssl_receive_and_assert_alpn, [ExpectedProtocol, Data]}},
  276:                     {options, ServerOpts}]),
  277: 
  278:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  279:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  280:                {host, Hostname},
  281:                {from, self()},
  282:                {mfa, {?MODULE, assert_alpn_and_renegotiate_and_send_data, [ExpectedProtocol, Data]}},
  283:                {options, ClientOpts}]),
  284: 
  285:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok).
  286: 
  287: %--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  288: 
  289: session_reused(Config) when  is_list(Config)->
  290:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  291:     ClientOpts = [{alpn_advertised_protocols, [<<"http/1.0">>]}] ++ ClientOpts0,
  292:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  293:     ServerOpts = [{alpn_preferred_protocols, [<<"spdy/2">>, <<"http/1.1">>, <<"http/1.0">>]}] ++  ServerOpts0,
  294: 
  295:     ssl_test_lib:reuse_session(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  296: 
  297: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  298: %% callback functions ------------------------------------------------
  299: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  300: 
  301: assert_alpn(Socket, Protocol) ->
  302:     ?CT_LOG("Negotiated Protocol ~p, Expecting: ~p ~n",
  303: 		       [ssl:negotiated_protocol(Socket), Protocol]),
  304:     Protocol = ssl:negotiated_protocol(Socket).
  305: 
  306: assert_alpn_and_renegotiate_and_send_data(Socket, Protocol, Data) ->
  307:     assert_alpn(Socket, Protocol),
  308:     ?CT_LOG("Renegotiating ~n", []),
  309:     ok = ssl:renegotiate(Socket),
  310:     ssl:send(Socket, Data),
  311:     assert_alpn(Socket, Protocol),
  312:     ok.
  313: 
  314: ssl_send_and_assert_alpn(Socket, Protocol, Data) ->
  315:     assert_alpn(Socket, Protocol),
  316:     ssl_send(Socket, Data).
  317: 
  318: ssl_receive_and_assert_alpn(Socket, Protocol, Data) ->
  319:     assert_alpn(Socket, Protocol),
  320:     ssl_receive(Socket, Data).
  321: 
  322: ssl_send(Socket, Data) ->
  323:     ?CT_LOG("Connection info: ~p~n",
  324:                [ssl:connection_information(Socket)]),
  325:     ssl:send(Socket, Data).
  326: 
  327: ssl_receive(Socket, Data) ->
  328:     ssl_receive(Socket, Data, []).
  329: 
  330: ssl_receive(Socket, Data, Buffer) ->
  331:     ?CT_LOG("Connection info: ~p~n",
  332:            [ssl:connection_information(Socket)]),
  333:     receive
  334:     {ssl, Socket, MoreData} ->
  335:         ?CT_LOG("Received ~p~n",[MoreData]),
  336:         NewBuffer = Buffer ++ MoreData,
  337:         case NewBuffer of
  338:             Data ->
  339:                 ssl:send(Socket, "Got it"),
  340:                 ok;
  341:             _ ->
  342:                 ssl_receive(Socket, Data, NewBuffer)
  343:         end;
  344:     Other ->
  345:         ct:fail({unexpected_message, Other})
  346:     after 4000 ->
  347:         ct:fail({did_not_get, Data})
  348:     end.
  349: 
  350: connection_info_result(Socket) ->
  351:     ssl:connection_information(Socket).
  352: 
  353: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  354: %% Internal functions ------------------------------------------------
  355: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  356: 
  357: run_failing_handshake(Config, ClientExtraOpts, ServerExtraOpts, ExpectedAlert) ->
  358:     ClientOpts = ClientExtraOpts ++ ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
  359:     ServerOpts = ServerExtraOpts ++ ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  360: 
  361:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  362:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  363:                     {from, self()},
  364:                     {mfa, {?MODULE, placeholder, []}},
  365:                     {options, ServerOpts}]),
  366: 
  367:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  368:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  369:                                            {host, Hostname},
  370:                                            {from, self()},
  371:                                            {mfa, {?MODULE, placeholder, []}},
  372:                                            {options, ClientOpts}]),
  373:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Server, Client, ExpectedAlert).
  374: 
  375: run_handshake(Config, ClientExtraOpts, ServerExtraOpts, ExpectedProtocol) ->
  376:     Data = "hello world",
  377: 
  378:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
  379:     ClientOpts = ClientExtraOpts ++ ClientOpts0,
  380:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  381:     ServerOpts = ServerExtraOpts ++  ServerOpts0,
  382: 
  383:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  384:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  385:                     {from, self()},
  386:                     {mfa, {?MODULE, ssl_receive_and_assert_alpn, [ExpectedProtocol, Data]}},
  387:                     {options, ServerOpts}]),
  388: 
  389:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  390:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  391:                {host, Hostname},
  392:                {from, self()},
  393:                {mfa, {?MODULE, ssl_send_and_assert_alpn, [ExpectedProtocol, Data]}},
  394:                {options, ClientOpts}]),
  395: 
  396:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok).
